modName: DA2 Hawke Armor Enhanced Textures - DELETED
summary: DA2 Hawke Warrior Armor with 4K textures
descriptionHtml:
As the title say, it's just one armor retexture, made, as always just applying some filters and not by repainting them, so I call them Enhanced Textures.

Original Armor: [url=http://modtype.doorblog.jp/archives/18375901.html]ModType link[/url]

[color=#ff0000][b]Please help me fill up the Credits!![/b][/color]

CREDITS:
BioWare for the original armor
Japanese guy for porting it to Skyrim
Whoever created paladindark_e.dds cubemap
author: Arjuna76
